EmailTemplate.name: 11/29/2012 - New customer Jumpstart.Follow up - Attendees
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending the VMTurbo Jumpstart Training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Thank you for attending the VMTurbo Jumpstart webcast on November 29th. We look forward to bringing you more of these types of webinars in the future. If you have comments or suggestions as to how we can improve them, please let us know in our short survey. <https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/F8N6DSX>
If you were not able to attend the entire session or would like to revisit parts of it, you can watch it here <http://support.vmturbo.com/forums/21120432-training>. Be aware that you will need to login with your VMTurbo Support Portal credentials to view the webcast. If you have any questions that arise as you view it, please let us know.
Besides the Jumpstart webinar, we also off a wide range of additional training options <http://go.vmturbo.com/pso-training-request.html>. If you have any questions with regards to these offerings, or would like to discuss custom training, please feel free to contact me.
We look forward to seeing you at one of our upcoming events again soon.
Sincerely,
Orna Kliger Director of Educational Services Marketo, Inc. 901 Mariners Island Blvd., San Francisco, CA, 94404
Contact Us <#>
